CustomField.description: If specified, the event on the calendar page will be given this CSS class. Multiple classes may be specified space-delimited. This field may be populated by workflows or process builder or triggers; any custom fields with "CSS" as part of the field name will also be used as sources of CSS class data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If specified, the event on the calendar page will be given this CSS class. Multiple classes may be specified space-delimited. This field may be populated by workflows or process builder or triggers.
CustomField.label: CSS Class
